translated: Wilhelm Busch is a humorist, cartoonist, German painter and poet, born April 15, 1832 and died January 9, 1908 in Lower Saxony, where he spent all his life.
original: Wilhelm Busch est un humoriste, dessinateur, peintre et poète allemand, né le 15 avril 1832 et mort le 9 janvier 1908 en Basse-Saxe, où il a passé toute sa vie.
